textBeforeTable: Method Summary Constructs an iterator over the given range of the given string, with the index set at the specified position. StringCharacterIterator(String text, int begin, int end, int pos) Constructs an iterator with the specified initial index. StringCharacterIterator(String text, int pos) Constructs an iterator with an initial index of 0. StringCharacterIterator(String text) Constructor and Description   Constructors Constructor Summary Fields inherited from interface java.text.CharacterIteratorDONE Field Summary CharacterIterator See Also: String. StringCharacterIterator class iterates over the entire String. The CharacterIterator protocol for a StringCharacterIterator implements the implements CharacterIterator extends Object public final class StringCharacterIterator

Parameters: text - The String to be iterated over pos - Initial iterator position StringCharacterIterator public StringCharacterIterator(String text, int begin, int end, int pos) Constructs an iterator over the given range of the given string, with the index set at the specified position. Parameters: text - The String to be iterated over begin - Index of the first character end - Index of the character following the last character pos - Initial iterator position Method Detail
